about_the_game:
Deep Sea Sweep is a cute 2D platformer where you play as a small fish who wants to give the seafloor its former beauty back. There are heaps of filthy treasure chests down there! Luckily, your yellow neighbour seems to appreciate them a lot, and can probably help you get rid of them.

  • Switch between swimming and classic platform movement by carrying treasures, dropping them on enemies or switches to progress.
  • Play through many short but challenging levels mixing action and puzzle.
  • Controls are easy to pick up, customizable, and allow tight movements.
  • The worldmap has many paths including secret ones. Play through each biome in the way you like!
  • Immerse yourself in tranquil pixel art environments, and meet colorful and cute characters and enemies.
  • Look out for secrets! Find each level's stars to unlock secret harder levels and shortcuts.
  • Change your character's appearance and style with all the pearls you've collected.
  • Challenge yourself by going for better times in each level.

Some say deep down at the bottom of the ocean lies a magic pearl that grants wishes... Maybe this would simplify your task. But in the meantime, there's golden trash to take out!

short_description: Deep Sea Sweep is a cute 2D platformer set on the ocean floor, inspired by traditional flash games. Clean up the sea of all these filthy treasures chests plaguing the various biomes! Swim, jump and bonk meanies on their head in many short but challenging levels with simple but tight controls.
